reviewText: A great collection of Christmas clasics
great movies really gave you a good feeling about Christmas and the Christmas season from beginning to end and all in between.

This collection contains 1 movie (Different Kind of Christmas) and 3 old TV specials. The movie is a low-budget story about a man who plays Santa all year long. It's mediocre but far better than the very short TV programs. You would do well to spend a few dollars more and get a true Christmas collection.
